perturbation.original_text: 4. Compensation; Allocation of Costs and Expenses (a) In full consideration of the provision of the services of the Blockchain Administrator set forth herein, the Fund shall pay the Blockchain Administrator a fees calculated at the annual rate of 0.20% of the value of the Fund's average annual net assets. Such fee shall be accrued daily and paid monthly in arrears.
perturbation.changed_text: 4. Compensation; Allocation of Costs and Expenses (a) In full consideration of the provision of the services of the Blockchain Administrator set forth herein, the Fund shall pay the Blockchain Administrator a fees calculated at the annual rate of 0.20% of the value of the Fund's average annual net assets. Such fee shall be accrued daily and paid monthly in advance.
perturbation.explanation: The change from 'monthly in arrears' to 'monthly in advance' creates a contradiction regarding when the Blockchain Administrator receives payment, creating uncertainty in enforcement.

perturbation.original_text: 7. Duration and Termination of this Agreement (a) This Agreement shall become effective as of the first date above written. This Agreement may be terminated at any time, without the payment of any penalty, upon 60 days' written notice, by the vote of a majority of the outstanding voting securities of the Fund or by the vote of the Fund's Trustees or by the Blockchain Administrator.
perturbation.changed_text: 7. Duration and Termination of this Agreement (a) This Agreement shall become effective as of the first date above written. This Agreement may be terminated at any time, without the payment of any penalty, upon 30 days' written notice, by the vote of a majority of the outstanding voting securities of the Fund or by the vote of the Fund's Trustees or by the Blockchain Administrator.
perturbation.explanation: Changing the termination notice period from '60 days' to '30 days' creates a direct contradiction regarding the required notice, making it unclear which notice period applies.

perturbation.original_text: 9. Amendments This Agreement may be amended pursuant to a written instrument by mutual consent of the parties.
perturbation.changed_text: 9. Amendments This Agreement may be amended pursuant to a written instrument by mutual consent of one of the parties.
perturbation.explanation: The change from 'mutual consent of the parties' to 'mutual consent of one of the parties' creates a contradiction regarding who can amend the agreement, introducing uncertainty in enforcement.
